verses.verse: <S%G3588><s%> Masters, <S%G2962><s%> That Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Just <S%G1342><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Equal <S%G2471><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Bondmen <S%G1401><s%> Give, <S%G3930><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> A Master <S%G2962><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Heavens. <S%G3772><s%>
<S%G3588><s%> In Prayer <S%G4335><s%> Steadfastly Continue, <S%G4342><s%> Watching <S%G1127><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> It <S%G846><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Thanksgiving; <S%G2169><s%>

Praying <S%G4336><s%> Withal <S%G260><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> May Open <S%G455><s%> To Us <S%G2254><s%> A Door <S%G2374><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> To Speak <S%G2980><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mystery <S%G3466><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> ' On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> I Have Been Bound, <S%G1210><s%>
That <S%G2443><s%> I May Make Manifest <S%G5319><s%> It <S%G846><s%> As It <S%G5613><s%> Behooves <S%G1163><s%> Me <S%G3165><s%> To Speak. <S%G2980><s%>
In <S%G1722><s%> Wisdom <S%G4678><s%> Walk <S%G4043><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Without, <S%G1854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Ransoming. <S%G1805><s%>

Let <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Your Be <S%G5216><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> With Salt <S%G217><s%> Seasoned, <S%G741><s%> To Know <S%G1492><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> It Behooves <S%G1163><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Each <S%G1520><s%> One <S%G1538><s%> To Answer. <S%G611><s%>

The Things <S%G3588><s%> ' Concerning <S%G2596><s%> Me <S%G1691><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Will Make Known <S%G1107><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Tychicus <S%G5190><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Beloved <S%G27><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Servant <S%G1249><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Fellow Bondman <S%G4889><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%>

With <S%G4862><s%> Onesimus, <S%G3682><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Beloved <S%G27><s%> Brother, <S%G80><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> They Will Make Known <S%G1107><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Here. <S%G5602><s%>

Salutes <S%G782><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Aristarchus <S%G708><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fellow Prisoner, <S%G4869><s%> My <S%G3450><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mark, <S%G3138><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cousin <S%G431><s%> Of Barnabas, <S%G921><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Ye Received <S%G2983><s%> Orders, <S%G1785><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> He Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Receive <S%G1209><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Justus, <S%G2459><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Are <S%G5607><s%> Of The <S%G1537><s%> Circumcision. <S%G4061><s%> These Are The <S%G3778><s%> Only <S%G3441><s%> Fellow Workers <S%G4904><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Were <S%G1096><s%> To Me <S%G3427><s%> A Consolation. <S%G3931><s%>

Salutes <S%G782><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Epaphras <S%G1889><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> A Bondman <S%G1401><s%> Of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> Striving <S%G75><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Prayers, <S%G4335><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Ye May Stand <S%G2476><s%> Perfect <S%G5046><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Complete <S%G4137><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

I Bear Witness <S%G3140><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Has <S%G2192><s%> Zeal <S%G2205><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> For <S%G5228><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Them <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Laodicea <S%G2993><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Them <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Hierapolis. <S%G2404><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Say <S%G2036><s%> To Archippus, <S%G751><s%> Take Heed To <S%G991><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Service <S%G1248><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Didst Receive <S%G3880><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Thou Fulfil. <S%G4137><s%>
